newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey says Kurd rebels kill 15 in minibus attack.
newsitem.headline: Turkey says Kurd rebels kill 15 in minibus attack.

text.p: Kurdish guerrillas have killed 15 people, including nine members of an anti-rebel village militia, in a rocket attack on a minibus in southeast Turkey, the state-run Anatolian news agency reported on Friday.
It said Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) rebels attacked the vehicle in the southeastern province of Hakkari, near the mountainous border with Iraq.
Turkish troops killed almost 30 guerrillas in three days of operations on the border earlier this week.
More than 21,000 people have died in 12 years of clashes between security forces and the PKK, fighting for Kurdish self-rule in southeast Turkey.
